title: LeaverBester Has Issues
body: Im really annoyed - i just got out of a low priority queue and now I'm back in one. My game crashed and it wasn't my fault which resulted in me not able to reconnect - an issue with userkernel ( The LOL launcher ) which once again had nothing to do with MY FAULT and i was dc for too long. Resulting in another 5 20 mins low pro queue. IT WASNT MY FAULT IT WAS THE STINKING GAMES SO Y DO I HAVE 2 PAY 4 IT

replies.body: There's unfortunately no way for the game server to tell if you disconnected from either the game crashing or you purposefully leaving. Patch 4.21 has been a nightmare for a lot of people lately.

Thanks - After i restarted the client fiddled with my router - to no avail but discovered that many issues were arising whenever the microwave was turned on. Turns out, Microwaves can interfere with wifi signals, and due to my routers location in the kitchen, internet quality was increasingly unstable. Thanks for replying.
